item.title: Welcome to the DevOps Lab
item.description: Activity 1: Introduction to Docker In this lab, we will look at some basic Docker commands and a simple build-ship-run workflow. We’ll start by running some simple containers, then we’ll use a Dockerfile to build a custom app. Finally, we’ll look at how to use bind mounts to modify a running container as you might if you were actively developing using Docker. Tasks: Task 0: Prerequisites Ensure you have Docker installed on your machine.
